ðŸ”¹ Prediction: 0
ðŸ”¹ Confidence: 87.27%

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 87.27%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 89.21%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 55.74%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 63.04%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 86.97%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 69.16%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 90.91%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

ðŸš¨ ANOMALOUS TRAFFIC DETECTED (Confidence: 99.17%)

This traffic is highly suspicious and may indicate one or more of the following:
- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Denial-of-Service (DoS) or Distributed DoS (DDoS) attacks
- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed

- Port scanning, reconnaissance, or lateral movement
- Attempts to exploit vulnerabilities or exfiltrate data
- Abnormally high traffic rates or malformed packet structures

Key anomaly indicators:
- Sharp deviations from learned benign patterns
- Detected by Isolation Forest based on statistical outliers
- Confirmed by Random Forest trained on real-world attack data

RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:
- Immediately isolate the source IP or subnet
- Check logs, firewall alerts, and IDS/IPS feedback
- Alert security teams and initiate incident response if needed
